<div data-splash><video autoplay preload muted width="1280" height="720" poster="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/video_bg.jpg"><source src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/topgearRTM-720.mp4" data-video-sd><source src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/topgearRTM-720.webm" data-video-sd><source src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/topgearRTM-1080.mp4" data-video-hd><source src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/topgearRTM-1080.webm" data-video-hd></video><div data-video-controls><div data-center><button data-video-control="play"><span data-icon></span><span data-text>Play/Pause</span></button><button data-video-control="mute"><span data-icon></span><span data-text>Mute/Unmute</span></button><button data-video-control="hd"><span data-icon></span><span data-text>HD</span></button></div></div><div data-nextpage><a href="#bbc-top-gear-challenge" data-scrollto><span data-icon></span><span data-text>Scroll</span></a></div></div>
<section data-section="bbc-top-gear-challenge">
	
	<a data-anchor id="bbc-top-gear-challenge" name="bbc-top-gear-challenge"></a>

	<header>
	<div data-center>
		<h1>Race Team Manager</h1>
		<img src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/rtm_logo-300x151.png" data-header-img /><img src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/tgc_logo-300x151.png" data-header-img />	</div>
	</header>
	
	<div data-featured-image><img src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/RTM-Title.jpg" width="3200" height="600"></div><div data-center><nav><a href="#bbc-top-gear-challenge" data-scrollto>Overview</a><a href="#media" data-scrollto>Media</a></nav></div><article><div data-center><div data-column="1" >
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/best-of-2014-lighter.png"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-205" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/best-of-2014-lighter.png" alt="best of 2014 lighter" width="160" height="40" /></a> <a href="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Best-of-September-Cropped.png"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-206" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Best-of-September-Cropped.png" alt="Best-of-September Cropped" width="160" height="58" /></a> <a href="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Editors-Choice.png"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-207" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Editors-Choice.png" alt="Editors' Choice" width="160" height="39" /></a></p>
</div>
<div data-column="1" >
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>Overview</strong><br />
In Race Team Manager you live the life of an up-and-coming team boss across various racing categories. Work your way up from the junior leagues to the pinnacle of motor sport and become a championship winning team!</p>
</div>
<div data-highlight="">
<div data-image>
<img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-147" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/P1-2560x1440-1024x576.png" alt="P1 2560x1440" width="1024" height="576" />
</div>
<div data-text>
<div data-middle>
<p><strong>Race Day</strong><br />
Featuring all the best parts of a traditional racing game, overtakes, pit stops and spectacular crashes are all fully interactive events using the various inputs for mobile devices and the latest cutting edge graphics.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div data-column="1/2" >
<p><strong>Management</strong><br />
Outside of Race Day you decide when and how to upgrade your car, and manage your driver and mechanic relationships. You’ll also sign sponsorship deals and invest in your facility to boost on track performance.</p>
</div>
<div data-column="1/2" >
<p><strong>Experience</strong><br />
Gameplay is short burst and immediate, and whether you’ve got a couple of minutes or hours to spare there are races to be won and management decisions to be made. Will you focus on the car, your team, the sponsors or your facility? As long as you’re winning you can run your team as you see fit!</p>
</div>
<div data-highlight="">
<div data-text>
<div data-middle>
<p><strong>Top Gear</strong><br />
Race on the legendary Top Gear Test Track and hire The Stig to race for your team. Take on the Slalom Challenge and compare Fastest Lap times with friends to see who’s the quickest!</p>
</div>
</div>
<div data-image>
<img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-149" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Britcar-1024x577.png" alt="Britcar" width="1024" height="577" />
</div>
</div>
<div data-column="1" data-align="centered">
<a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.bigbit.RaceTeamManager&amp;hl=en"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-12" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/icon-gp.png" alt="Google Play" width="135" height="38" /></a> <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/race-team-manager/id885819965?mt=8"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-13" src="http://bigbit.bluebit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/icon-appst.png" alt="App Store" width="135" height="40" /></a>
</div>
</div></article><div data-lower><div data-nested="media"><div data-center><header><a data-anchor name="media" id="media"></a><h2>Media</h2><nav><a href="#bbc-top-gear-challenge" data-scrollto>Overview</a><a href="#media" data-scrollto>Media</a></nav></header><div data-gallery="168,160,166,162,164,163,165,167,161">
<div data-images>
<div><a href="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/TOPGEAR-PANE.png" data-lightbox="168,160,166,162,164,163,165,167,161" rel="shadowbox[168,160,166,162,164,163,165,167,161]"><img data-lightbox="168,160,166,162,164,163,165,167,161" rel="shadowbox[168,160,166,162,164,163,165,167,161]"><img src="http://www.bigbit.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Pile-Up-398x224.png" /></a><a </div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
</section>
